com.vikwin.functcp.client

Class FunctionalTCPClient<Request,Reply>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vikwin.functcp.client.FunctionalTCPClient<Request,Reply>
  • Type Parameters:
    Request - Type of Request object
    Reply - Type of Reply object

    public class FunctionalTCPClient<Request,Reply>
extends java.lang.Object
    A client for FunctionalTCPServer.
    Author:
    Viktor Winkelmann

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FunctionalTCPClient(java.lang.String host, int port)
      Creates an instance of the Functional TCP Client that binds to a given host.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FunctionalTCPClient

        public FunctionalTCPClient(java.lang.String host,
                           int port)
        Creates an instance of the Functional TCP Client that binds to a given host.
        Parameters:
        host - Address of the server to connect to
        port - Port to connect to

    • Method Detail

      • sendRepliedRequest

        public Reply sendRepliedRequest(Request request)
                         throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Sends a request to the server and waits for a reply. This is used for synchronous messaging. If the connection is closed before a reply is received, the Reply object will be null.
        Parameters:
        request - The Request object to send
        Returns:
        Reply object from server or null
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown if host cannot be resolved
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if I/O exception occurs on creating a socket
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown if server Reply object is of unknown type

      • sendNonRepliedRequest

        public void sendNonRepliedRequest(Request request)
                           throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                                  java.io.IOException
        Sends a request to the server without expecting a reply. This is used for asynchronous messaging.
        Parameters:
        request - The Request object to send
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown if host cannot be resolved
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if I/O exception occurs on creating a socket
